name: Lloyd the Monkey: Remastered
storyline:
Centuries have passed since the new millennium, and not only has humanity taken to the stars, but our closest relatives have evolved to match us and have created a society all their own in the Amazon jungle, a paradise where nature and technology blend in harmony.

But destiny dictates that life never stays the same for very long, as a mysterious, bushy-tailed girl has fallen from the sky and, with nowhere else to go, has taken up residence with the Zaru brothers Lloyd and Arnie. Unbeknownst to all, this girl’s presence has attracted the attention of a seedy group of gorillas who have claimed land still poisoned by the sins of the past as their base.

For there is a secret hidden from all parties that will soon change the lives of everyone who gets tangled up in it. The Lloyd the Monkey saga is about to begin!
summary: Lloyd the Monkey: Remastered is a remastered version of the original game with various improvements, released originally for PC in the 2023 edition of Sonic Amateur Games Expo.
